summary: The story of a family living in a small godforsaken town in Turkey seen through the eyes of children and dealing with the growing complexity when one becomes an adult.
cast: Mehmet Emin Toprak|Havva Saglam|Cihat Bütün|Fatma Ceylan|Emin Ceylan|Sercihan Alevoglu|Semra Yilmaz|Latif Altintas|Muzaffer Özdemir|Timuçin Caymaz|Gazanfer Ündüz
title: Kasaba
